kpi.name: msc_560a

kpi_info.title: IPv4 traffic between the media gateways in erlangs
kpi_info.use: The IPv4 Erlangs counter shows the amount of IPv4 traffic
kpi_info.use_experience:
This is only valid for MSS and GCS network elements (not for MSC).Note: the objects are Virtual MGWs
PUBLISHED: M12
LAST UPDATE: 14-10-2010
THEORETICAL SUMMARY LEVELS: PLMN->MSC->MGWMNAME->NMGWNAME

RECOMMENDED SUMMARY LEVELS: MGWMNAME->NMGWNAME

KPI CLASS: Traffic
MEASUREMENT(S): IP and ATM measurement (M390)

kpi.kpi_alias: IPv4 traffic between the media gateways in erlangs
